lines.text: This, my friend, is the layout of the house where two swindlers are holding a young woman against her will.
Quiet! Someone is at the door! See who it is.
A tall, thin man... about forty, with a smooth face... wearing a long coat and carrying an ebony cane...
Smoking his pipe, Holmes starts to dream. Through the blue haze, he sees the sweet figure of Alice Faulkner.
So, will it be peace or war?
I have a weakness for dawdling, the better to observe.
For God's sake, don't let him get away! Follow the glow of his cigar...
Holmes, my good man. You're in love!
